title: Docker Mastery: Containerize Your Applications for Efficiency and Portability
description: Welcome to the world of containerization with Docker! This course equips you with the skills to package your applications with their dependencies into lightweight, portable containers, enabling efficient development, deployment, and scaling.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Fundamentals
learning_outcomes.content: Grasp the core concepts of containerization and Docker's role in simplifying application deployment and management. Explore the difference between VMs and containers.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Images and Building
learning_outcomes.content: Learn how to create Docker images, the building blocks of containers. Explore Dockerfiles with instructions for building container environments with specific software versions and configurations.

learning_outcomes.title: Running and Managing Containers
learning_outcomes.content: Master how to run Docker containers from pre-built images or your own custom images. Explore commands for starting, stopping, and managing container lifecycles.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Networking
learning_outcomes.content: Understand the fundamentals of networking between Docker containers. Learn about Docker's default network mode and explore techniques for creating custom networks for container communication.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Volumes and Storage
learning_outcomes.content: Discover how to manage persistent data storage for your containerized applications using Docker volumes. Explore mounting volumes from the host machine or external storage solutions.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Compose for Multi-Container Applications
learning_outcomes.content: Learn how to manage and orchestrate multi-container applications with Docker Compose. Define services and their dependencies in a YAML file for simplified deployment.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker Registries
learning_outcomes.content: Explore Docker Hub, a public registry for sharing and discovering Docker images. Understand private registries for hosting your own custom images within organizations.

learning_outcomes.title: Docker for Development Workflows
learning_outcomes.content: Learn how to leverage Docker for efficient development workflows. Explore techniques like containerized development environments and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines with Docker.

modules.title: Capstone Project
topics: Building a multi-container application with Docker Compose
